data.Quote: Envy of other people shows how they are unhappy. Their continual attention to others behavior shows how they are boring.
data.author: Seneca

data.Quote: There will come a time when you believe everything is finished. That will be the beginning.
data.author: Louis L’Amour

data.Quote: A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer.
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.Quote: The only difference between a problem and a solution is that people understand the solution.
data.author: Charles F. Kettering

data.Quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
data.author: Scott Adams

data.Quote: If you have always done it that way, it is probably wrong.
data.author: Charles F. Kettering

data.Quote: The source of wisdom is whatever is going to happen to us today.
data.author: Pema Chödrön

data.Quote: The most effective form of learning is practice, not planning.
data.author: James Clear

data.Quote: There are risks and costs to action. But they are far less than the long-range risks of comfortable inaction.
data.author: John F. Kennedy

data.Quote: The worst loneliness is to not be comfortable with yourself.
data.author: Mark Twain
